name: Pizza Oven Pita Bread, 3 pcs
description: Flatbread made from premium quality wheat flour that can be used to wrap kebabs, falafel, or gyros. It can also be served with exotic dips like creamy hummus, soft cheese, and much more. You can also cut and bake it to serve it as pita chips with your favourite dips. This delicious pita bread is yummy when it's warm as it is softer and even tastier.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
